# Support for BayKo&ccedil;

Thank you for using BayKo&ccedil;!

## Where to get help
- Issues: https://github.com/TarikAnafarta/BayKoc/issues
- Discussions: https://github.com/TarikAnafarta/BayKoc/discussions
- Documentation: https://github.com/TarikAnafarta/BayKoc#readme
- Tutorials/Examples:
  - Backend: https://github.com/TarikAnafarta/BayKoc/blob/dev/backend/README.md
  - Frontend: https://github.com/TarikAnafarta/BayKoc/blob/dev/frontend/README.md

## Before asking
- Search existing issues and discussions.
- Check the README and documentation.
- Provide a minimal, reproducible example if reporting a problem.

## When opening an issue
Include:
- Version(s) of BayKo&ccedil; and dependencies
- OS and runtime versions
- Steps to reproduce
- Expected vs actual behavior
- Logs or screenshots when relevant

## Security issues
For vulnerabilities, follow our [Security Policy](./SECURITY.md).
